page.title: 07New Housing Estates
page.content: Knebworth village is expanding rapidly. A number of new housing estates have been built recently, the latest being behind Wadnall Way and Meadway. Most of the houses are terraced houses but there are also a few detached houses. To make the new estate look more attractive the builders are laying turf and planting shrubs around the houses when they are finished. I think it will be very nice when it is finished. It is right by my Nan's house. They have put a fence up as well. My Nan is a bit upset because it blocks the nice views of the fields that she had before.
